CANOpen SDOs - Startup

CANOpen SDOs are frames used to configure slave devices. Often, SDOs are needed as CANOpen devices are correctly configured from the manufacturer. The contents of the SDO messages various from device to device and should be obtained from the manufacturer. This are SDOs generated to slave devices at start up.

What do you want to do?

Edit SDOs - startup

To edit the SDO settings, right-click SDOs and select Edit SDOs - startup from the shortcut menu.
